definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
ginger gets spicier as it gets older (idiom)/the older, the wiser
pinyin: jiang1 hai2 shi4 lao3 de5 la4

sentences.english: Does Bruce see him as a left-winger or a central midfielder?
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯会把他当成一个左边锋还是中场球员？

sentences.english: Are new products and services being offered that were not a part of the old site?
sentences.chinese: 还是提供的新产品和服务不属于旧的网站的一部分？

sentences.english: Or onto the person next to you?
She never learned how to read a milometer,or any meter.
sentences.chinese: 不管是里程表，还是什么表，她从来就不会看。

sentences.english: Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival, but I get up late as usual.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中秋节，但我还是一如往常的晚起。

sentences.english: I keep going round and round in circles and I don't see the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我不停地在绕圈，但我还是没有看到酒店。

sentences.english: I still tend to move my fingers, almost subconsciously, when doing arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 当做算术时，几乎是下意识的，我还是会想去掰手指。

sentences.english: Whether it is animals or ancient figures will let you clap wow .
sentences.chinese: 无论是动物还是古代人物都会让你拍手叫绝。

sentences.english: It was still pitch-dark when I started off from Delamu Inn.
sentences.chinese: 早上从德拉姆客栈出发时，四周还是漆黑一团。

sentences.english: But it still did not put an end to his shivering.
sentences.chinese: 可是他冷颤还是打个不停。

sentences.english: But here I am and there you are and it is the moment of and for Veritas.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我还是要站在这儿，跟你们聊聊。

sentences.english: I think we should go into the cave.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们还是回到那个山洞。

sentences.english: Wu Pan chooses or eat green meal.
sentences.chinese: 吴盼选择还是吃青春饭。

sentences.english: Of course, this is all just a fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这一切都还是空想。

sentences.english: I only know whether theGolden Path continues or ends.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道黄金之路是持续还是终止。

sentences.english: They're kinda cute when they're not quite big enough to trample you.
sentences.chinese: 当他们没有长大到足够攻击你的时候，还是很可爱的。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
